commit message: Initial commit of some playing around with the basics.
Added a TODO with our future plans.
Added pretty strings for all supported intents.
Better explanation of the difficulties involved with writing this app.
Improved layout; Display nicer list with icons.
Plan ahead which features we are going to have in V1.
Added another TODO.
We have a very basic version running now, showing all apps in a tree structure.
Added better icon.
Removed default text we only had in there for testing.
Prepare a changelog file.
Show more information about each event when requestd.
Highlight system apps.
Support filtering of system apps.
Show both receiver + app title, where it makes sense.
Upped a TODO to v1 priority.
Updated to Java 1.5 syntax.
Added menu icons.
Fixed the group row by making the icon clickable area bigger; also copied the icon we're using from Android framework resources to local project.
Slightly optimized group view visuals.
Updated icon resource in detail_toast layout to local as well.
Make the show info icon stateful.
Added a help activity.
Note that users may contact the author.
Added preliminary support for more actions (still lacking titles/descriptions; but we now also are able to handle actions where title or desription is missing.
Removed unused code.
Slightly improved text.
Made help scrollable.
Added titles/descriptions for the recently added new actions.
Slightly updated strings.
Made items clickable, provide some info and features.
Fixed dialog issues on orientation change.
Prepare for 1.0 release.
